snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include a $610,000 cup of coffee with Tim Cook, a suggestion that Google’s glasses may catch on despite their goofy...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include a $610,000 cup of coffee with Tim Cook, a suggestion that Google’s glasses may catch on despite their goofy look and a theory about the quality of some popular YouTube videos.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Anonymous Sharing and Historic Embarrassment
